column1: I have been using Oil of Olay facial cleanser for at least 10 years. I never have to worry about break outs, or drying out my skin. Love all their products! I don't use anything else.

My skin has been changing a lot lately (hit 40 and wrinkles really emerged). With combination skin battling both wrinkles and acne...I found most products either stripped my skin too dry or over-moisturized. Saw an ad for the Olay for You website and tried it. It recommended this product, and I couldn't be happier. After just a week of using, my skin is much improved. Now I'm researching all the OTHER Regenerist products I can! I'm so thrilled to finally find something that works so well for my skin type.

I just tried Regenerist Cleanser and the dead skin cells on my face started to peel off. Within two days I saw a visible difference on my facial skin, the fine lines literally disappeared. My skin is moist and supple with an even tone. I had a bottle of Olay Age Defying anti-wrinkle Daily Moisturizer which for some reason was sitting in my vanity draw unused, so I added that to my routine with the Night of Olay Cream, my skin feels and looks a lot better so I am going to buy the Regenerist line from now on. I give it 5 stars.
My go to cleanser! But seriously get better packaging. I end up with half the stuff on my hands and face when I squeeze the tub. But I LOVE the cleanser!

I'm reviewing this product purchased at Walmart to enter an Influenster contest. I had this product before and I have to say I like the consistency, the smell and how it cleans BUT I truly miss the beads. I wish they wouldn't have taken that off it. #Influenster #Contest

While not as oily as it was when I was younger, my skin is not dry. A lot of age-defying cleansers I've tried were too heavy and left my face feeling greasy, and products for younger skin left it feeling too dry. The Regenerist Daily Regenerating Cleanser is the perfect balance of moisture and cleanser. After washing, my face feels both clean and soft. It's the only facial cleanser I'll buy.

I've used a lot of other face washes and this one is hands down the best. I've used beta-hydroxy products since they started coming out with them. The exfoliating process of the Daily Regenerating Cleanser plus the moisturizing aspects make this my favorite. It must work. I get a lot of compliments about how young I look. I owe it all to Olay.

I am a firm believer that it takes at least a couple of weeks to note any difference with new products so imagine my surprise when after only 4 uses my skin is baby smooth. I used morning and night after use a cleanser. It is non-abrasive and gets the job done. Do yourself a favor and get this!

Great product my skin is smoother and more vibrant.
